skills.skill: Next Generation Sequence data analysis (ChIP-Seq, CutRun, ATAC-Seq, RNA-Seq, scRNA, scATAC, Hi-C/HI-CHIP/CaptureC)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and apply innovative analytical approaches to understand the underlying mechanisms that drive pediatric cancers and other human diseases.

Work on various analysis tasks and encourage the exploration of newly available methods, pipeline development to result in high-profile publications aligned with the ultimate goal of 'Finding cures. Saving children'.
Collaborate with different PIs and provide standardized/customized analysis using high-performance computing clusters or a cloud computing environment.
Integrative analyses and data visualization, developing and evaluating analytic tools.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in bioinformatics, cheminformatics, statistics/computer science (with a background in biological sciences or chemistry) or related field. Master's degree or PhD preferred.
